channel.title: AI & Telecom News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI & Telecom insights curated by n8n + Perplexity

item.title: How telecoms can thrive in the age of generative AI
item.description:
Telecom companies must adopt generative AI to reduce costs, drive growth, improve security, and transform into technology-driven firms offering AI-powered automation and services.

item.description:
Morgan Stanley's 2025 TMT conference in San Francisco highlights emerging trends in generative AI and their impact on technology, media, and telecom sectors.

item.title: [PDF] State of AI in Telecommunications: 2025 Trends - Congress.gov
item.description:

item.title: 150 AI use cases from leading startups and digital natives

item.title: AWS Selects 40 Startups for 2025 Generative AI Accelerator
item.description:
AWS has selected 40 startups for its 2025 Generative AI Accelerator, starting October 13 at Amazon HQ1 to support AI development.

item.title: Telco sector faces rising risks in AI, ineffective transformation ... - EY
item.description:
EY warns that the telecom sector faces increasing risks from AI integration challenges, ineffective digital transformation, and a complex geopolitical landscape.

item.title: Generative AI in Telecom: Unlocking the Next Growth Wave
item.description:
Generative AI, combined with AI-native platforms, zero trust, and quantum encryption, is driving the next growth wave in telecom enterprise security.

item.title: Seeing Double: An AI Bubble? | Richmond Fed
item.description:
The Richmond Fed questions if today's AI investments risk becoming another boom-and-bust cycle similar to the 1990s telecom industry collapse.

item.title: Top 5 Telco Stories This Week That Might Have Been Missed …
item.description:
